code: import React from'react';import'./NewsCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewsCard=_ref=>{let{article}=_ref;if(!article)return null;const formatDate=dateString=>{const options={year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric'};return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined,options);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-card",children:[article.urlToImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.urlToImage,alt:article.title,className:"news-image",onError:e=>e.target.style.display='none'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"news-title",children:article.title}),article.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"news-description",children:article.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"news-source",children:article.source.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"news-date",children:formatDate(article.publishedAt)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"read-more",children:"Read More"})]})]})]});};export default NewsCard;
